channel.title: Niagara on Petfactory
channel.description: Recent content in Niagara on Petfactory

item.title: UE5 - Niagara
item.description: Sprite Smoke A prechewed run-through of the sprite smoke tutorial. Sprite Smoke Note: This example uses the M_smoke_subUV Material, which can be found with the Starter Content. Create the System and Emitter Create a folder, name it “Niagara_fx” (or something else) and step into it. Create a Niagara System, RMB click > FX > Niagara System (or choose from create basic assets at the top of the popup menu) Select New system from selected emitters.
